snippet.title: MewnBase Trailer
snippet.description:
Now also available on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/743130/MewnBase/

MewnBase is a cute, 2D exploration/survival game. You land on a new, uncharted world only to realize you didn't bring any snacks and forgot half your luggage. But hey, at least you brought this workbench thing. You'll need to search around and collect resources in order to craft together a make-shift base. Construct a variety of different base modules, from airlocks to rain-water collectors in order to make your new home on this barren planet a little more cozy. 

Buy it today on itch.io for Windows and Linux: https://cairn4.itch.io/mewnbase

Join the MewnBase Discord server: https://discord.gg/7dyWGMK

---

Follow along in the game's development by following Cairn4 on: Twitter: https://twitter.com/cairn4 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cairn4.games
Mastodon: https://mastodon.social/@cairn4 
Devblog: https://cairn4.itch.io/mewnbase/devlog
